title: shop not working now? cant buy?
body: shop not working now? cant buy? shop not working now? cant buy? shop not working now? cant buy? shop not working now? cant buy? why no shop work for me? like champs and summoner icons and stuff pls fix

replies.body:
What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?

Very strange, because Riot just updated the shop to fix the mass problems people were facing before. Have you tried flushing your DNS?
That didn't really answer anything I asked.
